page.title: 20THE AUTHORS OF THESE PAGES
page.content: CLASS 1 _{EVE LANGFORD,DEBBIE DUTTON, {SUZY MORGAN,KAREN MORGAN,HARRIET {CHARNOCK,LISA CHAPMAN KAREN MORLEY, {CLAIRE EXCELL, SARAH BEESON, GARY {COOPER, ALEX YATES, SIMON VICKERS. CLASS 2 -{ANTHONY HUGHES, SCOTT {WALKER, DANA VITELLINI ANDREA {STEGGLES, TRACEY PEARCE, BECKY WELLS, {PHILLIPA MADAMS, KIRSTY McCRANOR. TEACHER _{MISS LEWIS We are children from the top 2 classes of the school. While the other children were away on a school trip to North Wales we went out and about in our D_Block collecting information for the Domesday project. We visited all the places we have written about and also went horseriding at Balcombe stables which is just south of our area. The pony that Scott rode had been ridden by Princess Margaret's 2 children when they were young.
